gnu.expr
Class ScopeExp

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--gnu.expr.Expression
        |
        +--gnu.expr.ScopeExp
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CatchClause, LambdaExp, LetExp
public abstract class ScopeExp
extends Expression

Abstract class for expressions that add local variable bindings.
